title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.7 - Nutrition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.7 - Nutrition

State Regulations
(a) Safe home
networks must ensure that three well-balanced and nutritious meals are
available daily to residents either at the safe home or offsite. (b) Consideration must be given to medically
prescribed nutritional needs, culture and religious practices. Nothing herein
requires the maintenance of separate kitchen facilities or supplies to comply
with cultural or religious practices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
454.7

Adopted

New

York State Register April 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 13, eff. 4/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
